text: tomorrow I'm having a barbecue in my

and I don't need to worry about

the thing about butterflied leg of lamb
is that it really absorbs the flavor of
a marinade well so you can add strong
flavors so I've got rosemary and thyme
and then plenty of garlic because you
have to have garlic with lamb it's the
law if you don't have garlic with lamb
the lamb police will come to your house
and they'll just put you in jail I like

then they get every little drop

right before I put it on the grill it

fridge so that the lamb can really
